channel.title: I need help making a server
channel.description: i need help on getting exact links to download the stuff needed to make the server and help putting the server up on a no-ip address

item.title: I need help making a server
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Spam would be this: ljksdfjlkaksfjkdfs
Backseat Modding would be this:[quote=“Tico135, post:4, topic:107778”][quote author=PatScape link=topic=154271.msg1452450#msg1452450 date=1181349552]
Ah. Hmm.

Hrm. Yeah. Uh-uh!

No.
Search, there’s a great server-making tut, tons of no-ip/port-forwarding tuts etc. Don’t get into the habit of other people searching for you, when it takes very little effort.
[/quote]

Don’t spam other people’s threads. Please read the rules before posting.[/quote]

Okay?
And I was telling him that it isn’t a good way to join the forums asking for everything.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help making a server

item.title: I need help making a server
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

Ok to make a server go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,134771.0.html
and once your done followin the tut make sure you have your firewall off and then you made an exception to hamachi. If you don’t know how to make an exception go to control panel>security center>windows firewall then go to the exceptions tab and click add port put hamachi for name and put port of your server, then click ok. The links to downloading stuff is on the link i sent you.

Read full topic
